DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether the change of serum and dialysate sodium level during hemodialysis can influence on blood pressure and intradialytic weight gain in chronic hemodialysis patients.
DOC.brief_title: The Study of Association Between Intradialysis Sodium Balance and Clinical Outcomes in Chronic Hemodialysis Patients
DOC.criteria: age 20 years or more hemodialysis vintage over 3 months dialyzed for 4 hours three times per week hemodialysis adequacy (Kt/V) over 1.2 diagnosed with chronic hepatitis or infection
